data.eml:eml: Re-description of Medetera glaucella Kowarz, 1878 (Diptera, Dolichopodidae) based on type material

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naglis, Stefan, Negrobov, Oleg P. (2014): Re-description of Medetera glaucella Kowarz, 1878 (Diptera, Dolichopodidae) based on type material. Zootaxa 3796 (1): 194-196, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3796.1.10
